thread.title: Sayes So wins Santa Anita turf feature
thread.title_full: Sayes So wins Santa Anita turf feature

author: wtopstaff
title: Sayes So wins Santa Anita turf feature
text:
Home » News » Sports » Sayes So wins Santa… Sayes So wins Santa Anita turf feature By The Associated Press October 23, 2015 8:13 pm 
ARCADIA, Calif. (AP) — Sayes So led all the way to win the $55,000 feature by a half-length Friday at Santa Anita. 
Ridden by Alex Solis, Sayes So ran 6 1/2 furlongs on the downhill turf course in 1:12.63 and paid $7.20, $3.80 and $2.60. 
Ramona’s Wildcat returned $3.40 and $2.20, while Doodetta was another 1 1/2 lengths back in third and paid $2.60 to show. 
The victory, worth $33,000, increased Sayes So’s career earnings to $128,400, with three wins in eight starts for trainer Richard Mandella. Topics:
